name: Curse of the Crescent Isle DX
description: A curse has befallen the Crescent Isle and it's up to you to save it. Luckily the curse has transformed your people into helpful monsters such as drills, blobs, icicles, and gravity flipping...things. With your monster subjects in hand you'll have to drill through rocks, maneuver through spiky terrain, freeze water to pass over the sea,...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 320 x 180 resolution or higher Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: While only an hour long and some other minor enemy issues, I can recommend this game for a quick nosalgia trip to NES platformer games (especially Super Mario Bros. 2).
Loved the game on Xbox 360, and I'm glad to see there's an upgraded version here on Steam.
too short to give this anything else than a thumbs down, not even worth it with -40%
